document_name: UNDP Access to Justice  Human Security in the Three Areas (May 2006).pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/SDN/00049191/UNDP Access to Justice  Human Security in the Three Areas (May 2006).pdf

outputs.output_descr:
Outcome
Rights upheld and protection in accordance with international and national laws through accountable and equitable justice and rule of law institutions. 

Outputs
1. Project Management & Operations
2. People's awareness of their rights is enhanced
3. People have access to an operational legal aid system
4. The justice system's capacity to provide justice is enhanced
5. Capacity of rural courts and traditional leaders to provide justice is enhanced
6. Training capacity of law enforcement institutions is enhanced
7. Community policing structures have been established and are operational
8. Local ownership and support to rule of law activities is enhanced and sustained.

CPAP Outcome: 
Rights upheld and protected in accordance with international and national laws through accountable and equitable justice and rule of law institutions

Project Outputs: 
1. Project Management & Operations
2. People's awareness of their rights is enhanced
3. People have access to an operational legal aid system
4. The capacity of the Judiciary and Legal Administration tp provide justice is enhanced
5. Capacity of rural courts and traditional leaders to provide justice is enhanced
6. Training capacity of law enforcement institutions is enhanced
7. Community policing structures have been established and are operational
8. Local ownership and support to rule of law activities is enhanced and sustained.

project_descr: Strengthening Access to Justice and Human Security in the Three Protocol Areas
project_title: Strengthening Access to Justice in the Three Areas
